dgantt
Class AdvancedTaskEditorHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      dgantt.BasicTaskEditorHandler
          dgantt.AdvancedTaskEditorHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener
public class AdvancedTaskEditorHandler
extends BasicTaskEditorHandler

A more advanced task editor than BasicTaskEditorHandler, which demonstrates features like snapping tasks to day boundaries, adding edits to an UndoManager, etc.

Field Summary
protected  GanttChartUndoableEdit edit
          The UndoableEdit if an edit is currently in progress; otherwise null.
protected  boolean fireChangeDuringEdit
          true if the GanttChart.fireChangeEvent() method is invoked as an edit is in progress; false otherwise.
protected  long minimumDuration
          The minimum allowed duration of a task.
protected  java.util.List<State> states
          The collection of states for the tasks currently being edited.
protected  javax.swing.undo.UndoManager undoManager
          The undo manager where completed edits are committed.
 
Fields inherited from class dgantt.BasicTaskEditorHandler
chart, lastPoint, mode, MOVE, MULTIPLE, NONE, RESIZE_END, RESIZE_START

minimumDuration

protected long minimumDuration
The minimum allowed duration of a task. Default is one day.
